home.title: Ark Nova Solo Helper
home.play1: Play the A.R.N.O. Solo Mode (unofficial) of Ark Nova.
home.play2: To play the solo mode you only need the base game. This helper application replaces the ARNO card deck and the dice and tracks ARNO's progression.

action.abortGameConfirm: Aborting the running game - are you sure?
action.endGameConfirm: End this game and return to home screen - are you sure?
